trans-unit.source: The secret key. (This is configurable and may be pointed at external storage locations, such as Amazon EC2. Four settings require configuration when pointing at an external cookbook storage location: bookshelf['vip'], for the endpoint used by the chef-client; bookshelf['external_url'], for the endpoint used by the Chef server; bookshelf['access_key_id'], for user access key; bookshelf['secret_access_key'], for secret key; and opscode_erchef['s3_bucket'], for the bucket name. Reconfigure the Chef server after changing these settings. Default value: generated by default.

trans-unit.source: The supervisor for the Chef server is configured to restart any service that fails, unless that service has been asked to change its state. The once subcommand is used to tell the supervisor to not attempt to restart any service that fails.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器的管理器配置为重新启动任何失败的服务，除非已要求该服务更改其状态。在 once 子命令用来告诉上司不尝试重新启动失败的任何服务。

trans-unit.source: The supervisor for the Chef server is configured to wait seven seconds for a service to respond to a command from the supervisor. If you see output that references a timeout, it means that a signal has been sent to the process, but that the process has yet to actually comply. In general, processes that have timed out are not a big concern, unless they are failing to respond to the signals at all. If a process is not responding, use a command like the kill subcommand to stop the process, investigate the cause (if required), and then use the start subcommand to re-enable it.
trans-unit.target: Chef服务器的管理员配置为等待七秒钟，以使服务响应管理员的命令。如果您看到引用超时的输出，则表示已向该流程发送了信号，但是该流程尚未真正符合要求。一般而言，已超时的过程并不是什么大问题，除非它们根本无法响应信号。如果进程没有响应，请使用 kill 子命令之类的命令来停止该进程，调查原因（如果需要），然后使用 start 子命令重新启用它。

trans-unit.source: The thread at http://comments.gmane.org/gmane.comp.jakarta.lucene.solr.user/99149 explains more fully, including describing an extreme case where it’s possible that 3x the storage might be necessary. Chef server usage of Apache Solr via the opscode-solr4 service will generally only require the used storage for the index + 1x that amount of storage in free space.

trans-unit.source: There are a number of encryption options and tools that can be used to create a password shadow hash. In general, using a strong encryption method like SHA-512 and the passwd command in the OpenSSL toolkit is a good approach, however the encryption options and tools that are available may be different from one distribution to another. The following examples show how the command line can be used to create a password shadow hash. When using the passwd command in the OpenSSL tool:

trans-unit.source: This is because composite resources aren’t “real” resources from the perspective of the the Local Configuration Manager (LCM). Composite resources are used by the “configuration” keyword from the PSDesiredStateConfiguration module, and then evaluated in that context. When using DSC to create the configuration document (the Managed Object Framework (MOF) file) from the configuration command, the composite resource is evaluated. Any individual resources from that composite resource are written into the Managed Object Framework (MOF) document. As far as the Local Configuration Manager (LCM) is concerned, there is no such thing as a composite resource. Unless that changes, the dsc_resource resource and/or Invoke-DscResource command cannot directly use them.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为从本地配置管理器（LCM）的角度来看，复合资源不是“真实”资源。组合资源由 PSDesiredStateConfiguration 模块中的“ configuration”关键字使用，然后在该上下文中进行评估。当使用DSC通过配置命令创建配置文档（被管理对象框架（MOF）文件）时，将评估复合资源。该复合资源中的任何单个资源都将写入托管对象框架（MOF）文档。就本地配置管理器（LCM）而言，没有诸如复合资源之类的东西。除非进行了更改，否则dsc_resource资源和/或 Invoke-DscResource 命令无法直接使用它们。

trans-unit.source: This section describes the upgrade process for a standalone configuration. The upgrade process will require downtime equal to the amount of time it takes to stop the server, run dpkg or RPM Package Manager, and then upgrade the server.

trans-unit.source: This section describes the upgrade process from a high availability Enterprise Chef 11 to Chef server 12. The upgrade process will require downtime equal to the amount of time it takes to stop the server, run dpkg or RPM Package Manager, and then upgrade the server. The final step will remove older components (like CouchDB) and will destroy the data after the upgrade process is complete.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了从高可用性企业级Chef 11升级到Chef服务器12的过程。升级过程需要的停机时间相当于停止服务器、运行 dpkg 或 RPM 包管理器,然后升级服务器所需的时间。最后一步将删除旧组件(如CouchDB),并在升级过程完成后销毁数据。

trans-unit.source: This section describes the upgrade process from a high availability configuration. The upgrade process will require downtime equal to the amount of time it takes to stop the server, run dpkg or RPM Package Manager, and then upgrade the server.

trans-unit.source: This section describes the upgrade process from a standalone Enterprise Chef 11 to Chef server 12. The upgrade process will require downtime equal to the amount of time it takes to stop the server, run dpkg or RPM Package Manager, and then upgrade the server. The final step will remove older components (like CouchDB) and will destroy the data after the upgrade process is complete.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了从独立的Enterprise Chef 11升级到Chef服务器12的过程。升级过程需要的停机时间相当于停止服务器、运行 dpkg 或 RPM 包管理器,然后升级服务器所需的时间。最后一步将删除旧组件(如CouchDB),并在升级过程完成后销毁数据。

trans-unit.source: This section describes the upgrade process from a standalone configuration of Open Source Chef 11.1.0 (or higher) to a standalone configuration of Chef server 12. trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了从独立配置的开源Chef 11.1.0(或更高版本)升级到独立配置的Chef服务器12的过程。升级过程需要的停机时间相当于停止服务器、运行 dpkg 或 RPM 软件包管理器,然后升级服务器所需的时间。

trans-unit.source: This section provides guidance for capacity planning and how to choose the right configuration–standalone, high availability, or tiered–for the Chef server. This section provides guidance and not hard/fast rules. This is because some requests to the Chef server API are more computationally expensive than others. In general, it’s better to start small and then scale the Chef server as needed. Premature optimization can hinder more than help because it may introduce unnecessary complexity.
trans-unit.target: 本节提供容量规划以及如何为Chef服务器选择正确的配置（独立，高可用性或分层）的指南。本部分提供指导，而非硬性规定。这是因为对Chef服务器API的某些请求在计算上比其他请求更为昂贵。通常，最好从小处开始，然后根据需要扩展Chef服务器。过早的优化可能会带来更多的帮助，因为它可能会引入不必要的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Typically, actions are processed during the execution phase of the chef-client run. However, sometimes it is necessary to run an action during the compile phase. For example, a resource can be configured to install a package during the compile phase to ensure that application is available to other resources during the execution phase.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,动作是在chef-client运行的执行阶段处理的。然而,有时需要在编译阶段运行一个动作。例如,可以配置一个资源在编译阶段安装一个包,以确保应用程序在执行阶段对其他资源可用。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Chef server does not require a high availability or tiered topology until the number of CCRs/min is higher than 333/min (approximately 10k nodes).
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,Chef服务器不需要高可用性或分层拓扑,直到CCR/min的数量高于333/min(约10k节点)。

trans-unit.target: UIDs和GIDs

trans-unit.source: UNIX- and Linux-based systems: A quoted 3-5 character string that defines the octal mode that is passed to chmod. For example: '755', '0755', or 00755. If the value is specified as a quoted string, it works exactly as if the chmod command was passed. If the value is specified as an integer, prepend a zero (0) to the value to ensure that it is interpreted as an octal number. For example, to assign read, write, and execute rights for all users, use '0777' or '777'; for the same rights, plus the sticky bit, use 01777 or '1777'.
trans-unit.target: 基于UNIX和Linux的系统：带引号的3-5个字符串，用于定义传递给chmod的八进制模式。例如： '755' ， '0755' 或 00755 。如果将值指定为带引号的字符串，则其工作原理与传递 chmod 命令完全相同。如果将值指定为整数，请在该值前加上零（ 0 ）以确保将其解释为八进制数。例如，要为所有用户分配读取，写入和执行权限，请使用 '0777' 或 '777' ;对于相同的权利，再加上粘性位，请使用 01777 或 '1777' 。

trans-unit.source: Unlike chef-client, where the node object is stored on the Chef server, chef-solo stores its node objects as JSON files on disk. You can control the location of this directory via the node_path value in your configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 与chef-client不同，chef-client将节点对象存储在Chef服务器上，而chef-solo将其节点对象作为JSON文件存储在磁盘上。默认情况下，chef-solo将这些文件存储在与 cookbooks 目录相同的目录中的 nodes 文件夹中。您可以通过配置文件中的 node_path 值来控制此目录的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use --force to download files even when the file on the hard drive is identical to the object on the server (role, cookbook, etc.). trans-unit.source: Use node.default (or maybe node.override) instead of node.set because node.set is an alias for node.normal. Normal data is persisted on the node object. Therefore, using node.set will persist data in the node object. If the code that uses node.set is later removed, if that data has already been set on the node, it will remain.
trans-unit.target: 使用 node.default （或者 node.override ），而不是 node.set 因为 node.set 是一个别名 node.normal 。普通数据将保留在节点对象上。因此，使用 node.set 将把数据持久保存在node对象中。如果以后删除了使用 node.set 的代码，则如果该数据已在节点上设置，它将保留。

trans-unit.source: Use node.run_state to stash transient data during a chef-client run. This data may be passed between resources, and then evaluated during the execution phase. run_state is an empty Hash that is always discarded at the end of the chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 在Chef-Client运行期间，使用 node.run_state 存放临时数据。该数据可以在资源之间传递，然后在执行阶段进行评估。 run_state 是一个空哈希，始终在chef-client运行结束时被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Use of a response_file is only supported on Debian and Ubuntu at this time. Custom resources must be written to support the use of a response_file, which contains debconf answers to questions normally asked by the package manager on installation. Put the file in /files/default of the cookbook where the package is specified and the chef-client will use the cookbook_file resource to retrieve it.

trans-unit.source: Use the _unless variants carefully (and only when necessary) because when they are used, attributes applied to nodes may become out of sync with the values in the cookbooks as these cookbooks are updated. This approach can create situations where two otherwise identical nodes end up having slightly different configurations and can also be a challenge to debug.
trans-unit.target: 谨慎使用 _unless 变体（且仅在必要时使用），因为使用它们时，应用于节点的属性可能会随着更新这些食谱而与食谱中的值不同步。这种方法可能会导致两个原本相同的节点最终具有略微不同的配置，并且调试起来也很困难。

trans-unit.source: Use the attribute? method to ensure that certain actions only execute in the presence of a particular node attribute. The attribute? method will return true if one of the listed node attributes matches a node attribute that is detected by Ohai during every chef-client run.
trans-unit.target: 使用 attribute? 确保某些操作仅在存在特定节点属性的情况下执行的方法。该 attribute? 如果列出的节点属性之一与Ohai在每次厨师客户端运行期间检测到的节点属性匹配，则该方法将返回true。

trans-unit.target: 使用 control 方法来定义一系列特定的测试，这些测试包括一次审核。甲 control 方法必须包含在一个内 control_group 块。甲 control_group 块可以包含多种 control 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the converge_if_changed method inside an action block in a custom resource to compare the desired property values against the current property values (as loaded by the load_current_value method). trans-unit.target: 在自定义资源中的 action 块内使用 converge_if_changed 方法，以将所需属性值与当前属性值（由 load_current_value 方法加载）进行比较。使用 converge_if_changed 方法可确保仅在系统上的属性值不是所需的属性值时才进行更新，否则将导致资源无法收敛。

trans-unit.source: Use the download argument to download a cookbook from the community website. A cookbook will be downloaded as a tar.gz archive and placed in the current working directory. If a cookbook (or cookbook version) has been deprecated and the --force option is not used, knife will alert the user that the cookbook is deprecated and then will provide the name of the most recent non-deprecated version of that cookbook.
trans-unit.target: 使用 download 参数可从社区网站下载食谱。食谱将作为tar.gz存档下载，并放置在当前工作目录中。如果某个食谱（或食谱版本）已被弃用，而未使用 --force 选项，则knife将提醒用户该食谱已被弃用，然后提供该食谱的最新未弃用版本的名称。

trans-unit.source: Use the edit argument to edit role details on the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用 edit 参数可在Chef服务器上编辑角色详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the edit argument to edit the attributes of an environment. When this argument is run, knife will open $EDITOR to enable editing of ENVIRONMENT attributes. When finished, knife will update the Chef server with those changes.
trans-unit.target: 使用 edit 参数来编辑环境的属性。运行此参数时，knife将打开$ EDITOR以启用对 ENVIRONMENT 属性的编辑。完成后，小刀将使用这些更改来更新Chef服务器。

trans-unit.source: Use the edit argument to edit the data contained in a data bag. If encryption is being used, the data bag will be decrypted, the data will be made available in the $EDITOR, and then encrypted again before saving it to the Chef server.
trans-unit.target: 使用 edit 参数编辑数据包中包含的数据。如果使用加密，则将对数据包进行解密，并将数据保存在$ EDITOR中，然后再次加密，然后再将其保存到Chef服务器中。

trans-unit.source: Use the edit argument to edit the details of a registered API client. When this argument is run, knife will open $EDITOR to enable editing of the admin attribute. trans-unit.source: Use the force_default attribute to ensure that an attribute defined in a cookbook (by an attribute file or by a recipe) takes precedence over a default attribute set by a role or an environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用 force_default 属性可确保在食谱中（通过属性文件或配方）定义的属性优先于角色或环境设置的 default 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the force_override attribute to ensure that an attribute defined in a cookbook (by an attribute file or by a recipe) takes precedence over an override attribute set by a role or an environment.
trans-unit.target: 使用 force_override 属性可确保在食谱中（通过属性文件或配方）定义的属性优先于角色或环境设置的 override 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the from file argument to add or update an environment using a JSON or Ruby DSL description.
trans-unit.target: 使用 from file 参数使用JSON或Ruby DSL描述添加或更新环境。

trans-unit.source: Use the from file argument to create a node using existing node data as a template.
trans-unit.target: 使用 from file 参数使用现有节点数据作为模板来创建节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the from file argument to create a role using existing JSON data as a template.
trans-unit.target: 使用 from file 参数使用现有JSON数据作为模板来创建角色。

trans-unit.source: Use the from file argument to:
trans-unit.target: 使用 from file 参数执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Use the git rev-parse and git ls-remote commands to verify that the chef-client is synchronizing commits correctly. (The chef-client always runs git ls-remote on the upstream repository to verify the commit is made to the correct repository.)
trans-unit.target: 使用 git rev-parse 和 git ls-remote 命令来验证Chef-client是否正确同步提交。（chef-client总是在上游存储库上运行 git ls-remote ，以验证是否对正确的存储库进行了提交。）

trans-unit.source: Use the helper attribute in a recipe to define an inline helper method. Use the helpers attribute to define an inline helper module or a cookbook library module.
trans-unit.target: 在配方中使用 helper 属性定义内联帮助方法。使用 helpers 属性定义内联帮助模块或菜谱库模块。

trans-unit.source: Use the install argument to install a cookbook that has been downloaded from the community site to a local git repository . This action uses the git version control system in conjunction with the https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks site to install community-contributed cookbooks to the local chef-repo. Using this argument does the following:
trans-unit.target: 使用 install 参数安装已经从社区站点下载到本地git存储库的食谱。此操作将git版本控制系统与https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks网站结合使用，以将社区贡献的食谱安装到本地Chef-repo。使用此参数执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Use the key create argument to create a public key.
trans-unit.target: 使用 key create 参数创建公共密钥。

trans-unit.source: Use the key delete argument to delete a public key.
trans-unit.target: 使用 key delete 参数删除公共密钥。

trans-unit.source: Use the key edit argument to modify or rename a public key.
trans-unit.target: 使用 key edit 参数来修改或重命名公共密钥。

trans-unit.source: Use the key list argument to view a list of public keys for the named client.
trans-unit.target: 使用 key list 参数可以查看命名客户端的公共密钥列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the key list argument to view a list of public keys for the named user.
trans-unit.target: 使用 key list 参数可以查看指定用户的公共密钥列表。

trans-unit.source: Use the key show argument to view details for a specific public key.
trans-unit.target: 使用 key show 参数可查看特定公共密钥的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Use the knife bootstrap subcommand to bootstrap a node using the omnibus installer
trans-unit.target: 使用 knife bootstrap 子命令来通过omnibus安装程序来引导节点
